page.title: 20TOURISM
page.content: The countryside if this block attracts many tourists each year. Many of the farms of Suffolk now have rooms for "Bed and Breakfast" holidays. In Kersey village has an inn where tourists can stay. The water running across the road at the ford in Kersey makes it a popular place to visit. It is a scene that is often painted or used in films. Because a lot of people visit Kersey this a lot of people want to live there. There is also a restaurant opposite the inn. There is also a pottery which makes pots and sells them. Most of the shops and public houses in this block need people to come and visit them from the local towns. The buses here only go in the morning and afternoon so you need a car to get to them.
